product_name: Leki Lhasa Lite Aergon SpeedLock Women's Trekking Poles - Pair
long_description: The women's Leki Lhasa Lite Aergon SpeedLock trekking poles let you navigate the trails with ease, offering lightweight, telescoping utility to support your every trek. Lightweight Aergon Cor-Tec compact grips feature a cork/rubber composite that reduces sweat to offer a superior grip. Positive Angle grips position the hands at an ergonomically correct angle for optimal swing efficiency and stress relief at wrists. Aluminum alloy allows thin shaft walls providing a 20% reduction in swing weight without loss of strength. Simple and fast, Speedlock external locking system adjustment requires little effort to securely lock pole sections into position. 3-section telescoping poles extend from 25.2 to 49.25 in. Baskets provide extra support on soft terrain. Scratch-resistant surfaces and high polish lacquering protect your poles from abrasion. Leki Lhasa Lite trekking poles feature durable carbide tip ends to optimize grip on ice and rocks.
short_description: The women's Leki Lhasa Lite Aergon SpeedLock trekking poles let you navigate the trails with ease, offering lightweight, telescoping utility to support your every trek.
